snippet.title: Obsidian Conflict reanimated HL2 weapons
snippet.description:
Our animator Troop wanted to spice up the vanilla HL2 weapons, and with Juniez releasing his excellent HL2 weapons models, this chance couldn't be missed, so he has been reanimating them for a while.


While the work shown on this video is still W.I.P. ( as for example the SLAM materials have not been reworked yet, the dynamic scope has to be "re-added" to the crossbow, or decide if to replace the current vanilla sounds with the ones done by Navaro ), we wanted to show them off anyway as a Christmas gift.

Credits
Juniez - Original weapon meshes and textures
M4tl0ck - Original hand mesh
Thanez - Modified hand mesh and textures
LT_Commander - Arm mesh and textures
Troop - New animations, mesh, texture and VMT tweaks
A-06 - HD medkit model and textures

Website: http://obsidianconflict.net 
Discord: https://discord.gg/6FSw7Qp
